t: Amazon.com: AccuPost PP-100 Desktop Postal Scale - 10 lbs. : Office Products
s: The Accupost Desktop Postal Scale has an extra large 1.3 inch LCD display that is easy to read. A touch of a button switches between ounces and grams. This desktop unit has a weighing range of one ounce to 10 pounds. A flip-top easel makes weighing a large envelope a snap.
